name: MyGoldWallet
0:
”Alexa, ask My Gold Wallet how much is gold?”
”Alexa, ask My Gold Wallet my balance.”
”Alexa, ask My Gold Wallet list my wallets.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my gold wallet
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the current value of your gold, silver, and platinum holdings. Your holdings can be divided into metal-specific 'wallets' however you want. For instance, you can create a gold wallet called 'Eagles' and a gold wallet called 'Maples'. Asking this skill to 'list my wallets' would then give you the values of your eagles and maples separately. Or, asking this skill 'my balance' would total them up for you.

To change how your metal wallets are grouped, or to add/remove holdings, simply disable and re-enable this skill, and you'll be able to provide a new set of holdings.
